EmailTemplate.name: Marketo Test Email from Sal (1558976838.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: Marketo Test Email from Sal (1558976838.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
​Kevin, good afternoon!
!! CONGRATULATIONS !! Today we have an AMAZING deal for you and one other lucky person for an ALL-INCLUSIVE trip to the Grand Tamale Islands! Enjoy seven days and six nights at our all-inclusive resort featuring stunning views of the Balsarian Ocean, with UNLIMITED drinks and food!
Click this link <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/]]> [grand & toy website] here to fill out your details and we'll have you flying off to the Grand Tamale Islands!
DISCLAIMER: Offer available only to residents of Mongolia. Entrants must be 72 years of age or older, and must be shorter than 5'2" and must also weigh no less than 180 lbs. You must also have bright pink hair and gray lipstick to claim this prize. Time of travel is only limited to the month of March, 2022. Other conditions apply. Please see your local BDM for more details.
